title: Compiler panics on #[repr(C)] + #[derive(debug)] + #[rustc_layout_scalar_valid_range_end(_)] on tuple structs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

labels.name: F-rustc_attrs
labels.description: Internal rustc attributes gated on the `#[rustc_attrs]` feature gate.

body:
The compiler will panic when all these attributes are enabled at once. Note the commented-out code that triggers a related panic. ### Code [Playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=459951881885dde344cac48c3506b18f) ```Rust #![feature(rustc_attrs)] // Uncommenting any of these attributes will successfully compile #[repr(C)] #[derive(Debug)] #[rustc_layout_scalar_valid_range_end(0x7F)] struct Integer(u8); // triggers different compiler panic /* #[repr(C)] #[derive(Debug)] #[rustc_layout_scalar_valid_range_end(0xFFFF)] struct Integers(u8, u8); */ ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0-nightly (8e54a2113 2021-02-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 8e54a21139ae96a2aca3129100b057662e2799b9 commit-date: 2021-02-13 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.52.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'nonscalar layout for layout_scalar_valid_range type Integer: Layout { fields: Arbitrary { offsets: [ Size { raw: 0, }, ], memory_index: [ 0, ], }, variants: Single { index: 0, }, abi: Aggregate { sized: true, }, largest_niche: None, align: AbiAndPrefAlign { abi: Align { pow2: 0, }, pref: Align { pow2: 3, }, }, size: Size { raw: 1, }, }', compiler\rustc_middle\src\ty\layout.rs:955:30 stack backtrace: note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.52.0-nightly (8e54a2113 2021-02-13) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [layout_raw] computing layout of `Integer` end of query stack ```
